entity.name: The workspace is used for storing documents locally. This enables you to download documents to your local filesystem and then work on the document whilst being offline.
Der Workspace wird benützt für bla bla bla.

After becoming online again, Yulup will compare the modified documents to the versions on the CMS, and inform you about potential conflicts with documents which were changed on the server in the meantime.
Der Workspace wird benützt für bla bla bla.

Furthermore, you can edit the documents stored in the workspace from outside of Yulup. Also, you can add resources to your workspace, and the next time you tell Yulup to sync with the server, these resources are automatically uploaded to the CMS.
Der Workspace wird benützt für bla bla bla.
Documents opened in the editor can automatically be save to the workspace. This enables you to bla bla bla.
Dokumente, die im Editor geöffnet werden, können automatisch in den Workspace abgelegt werden. Dies ermöglicht bla bla bla.
